name: Shadhavar
languages: understands Elvish and Umbral but can't speak

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: A shadhavar's innate spellcasting ability score is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: disguise self (as horse or unicorn only)
2/day: darkness (centered on itself, moves with the shadhavar)

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: A shadhavar's gore attacks are magical.

trait.name: Plaintive Melody (3/day)
text: As a bonus action, a shadhavar can play a captivating melody through its hollow horn. Creatures within 60 feet that can hear the shadhavar must make a successful DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the start of the shadhavar's next turn. A creature charmed in this way is incapacitated, its speed is reduced to 0, and a shadhavar has advantage on attack rolls against it.

trait.name: Shadesight
text: A shadhavar's darkvision functions in magical darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
text: A shadhavar makes one gore attack and one hooves attack.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
